-- 보르고 스크립트 -- Programming by Joongpil Cho
function NPC_1000004:Init(NPCID) --[[ 1: OTL 누적데미지 2: OTL Count --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2)
NPC_1000004.LimitForOTL = NPC_1000004.MaxHP/20
NPC_1000004.TalidIdot = 211000113 NPC_1000004.TalidOTL = 211000115 NPC_1000004.TalidEnrage = 211000109 NPC_1000004.TalidPain = 211000117
NPC_1000004.TalidWhirlWind = 211000107 NPC_1000004.TalidHeapAttack = 211000111 NPC_1000004.TalidKnockBack = 211000116 NPC_1000004.TalidThrowStone = 211000108 end
function NPC_1000004:OnFinishDashAttack( ThisActor, Opponent ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 )
if ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() > 0.5 and math.random( 0, 1 ) == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidIdot ) end end
function NPC_1000004:OnFinishAndAggro( ThisActor, Opponent ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_1000004:Stressed( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Distance = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local r = math.random(0, 3)
if Distance < 600 then -- 근거리 if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000004.TalidWhirlWind ) then return end
if r == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidWhirlWind ) elseif r == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidHeapAttack ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidKnockBack ) end else if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_1000004.TalidKnockBack, Enemy ) return end
if r == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_1000004.TalidKnockBack, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_1000004.TalidThrowStone, Enemy ) end end end
function NPC_1000004:OTL(HitInfo) local ThisNPC = HitInfo.Victim local attacker = HitInfo.Attacker
local totalDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage local totalCount = ThisNPC:GetUserData(2)
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, totalDamage)
if totalDamage > NPC_1000004.LimitForOTL then if totalCount < 4 then ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, 0) ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, totalCount + 1)
if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000004.TalidEnrage ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidEnrage ) end
return HitInfo else if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000004.TalidPain ) or ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000004.TalidOTL ) then return HitInfo end
ThisNPC:SetUserData(1, 0) ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, totalCount + 1)
ThisNPC:ClearJob()
if totalCount % 2 == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidPain ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000004.TalidOTL ) end
return HitInfo end end
return HitInfo end
-- 매번 불리기 때문에 조심!!!!! function NPC_1000004:OnHitCapsule_0_0(HitInfo) return NPC_1000004:OTL(HitInfo) end
function NPC_1000004:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_1000004:OTL(HitInfo) end
function NPC_1000004:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_1000004:OTL(HitInfo) end
function NPC_1000004:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) -- 머리 뽀개기 local victim = HitInfo.Victim local attacker = HitInfo.Attacker
if victim:CheckBPart(1) then return HitInfo end
if victim:GetHP()/victim:GetMaxHP() < 0.3 then victim:BreakPart(1, attacker) end
return HitInfo end
